{"id":890461225,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1675397057,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/890461225/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int n) {\n        if(n == 1) return s;\n\n        int len = s.size();\n\n        char zigzag[n][len/2];\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<len/2; j++) {\n                zigzag[i][j] = '.';\n            }\n        }\n\n        int i=0, j=0;\n        bool isDown = true;\n        for(int k=0; k<s.size(); k++) {\n            zigzag[i][j] = s[k];\n            \n            if(i == n-1) {\n                isDown = false;\n                i--;\n                j++;\n                continue;\n            }\n\n            if(i == 0 && j > 0) {\n                isDown = true;\n                i++;\n                continue;\n            }\n\n            if(isDown) i++;\n            else {\n                i--;\n                j++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        string ans = \"\";\n\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<len/2; j++) {\n                if(zigzag[i][j] != '.') ans.push_back(zigzag[i][j]);\n            }\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false}
